blocks.label: Title
blocks.text: What’s Your Emotional Intelligence Superpower?

blocks.label: Description
blocks.text:
Whether you're navigating stress, leading others, or building deeper 
connections, Emotional Intelligence (EI) is a game-changer. 

This quiz reveals your dominant EI strength and gives you insight into how 
you can develop your full emotional potential. Tap into what truly makes
 you powerful — from empathy to self-awareness.

Let’s find out what your superpower is.

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: When faced with a tense situation, what’s your first reaction?

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: D. Think about how to bring everyone back together.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: C. Look for the lesson or silver lining.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: B. Take a moment to notice how it affects me.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: A. Tune into how others are feeling.

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: Someone you care about is upset —what do you do?

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: D. Find ways to motivate or cheer them up.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: C. Reassure them that things will improve.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: B. Reflect on your own reactions and avoid adding tension.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: A. Listen and feel what they feel.

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: You’re under pressure. How do you handle it?

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: D. Rally your circle for support and progress.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: C. Keep a positive mindset and keep moving.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: B. Get clear about your own emotional triggers.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: A. Stay calm for others’ sake.

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: In a group project, what role do you naturally fall into?

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: D. The one who unites the vision and people.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: C. The one who keeps morale high.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: B. The one who reflects on how things are flowing.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: A. The one who keeps harmony.

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: You’ve made a mistake — what’s your approach?

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: D. Reframe it as part of the bigger mission.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: C. Laugh, learn, and get better.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: B. Own up and learn about yourself through it.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: A. Acknowledge how others may feel about it.

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: Your inner voice sounds like…

blocks.label: Answer A
blocks.text: A. “How are they feeling?”

blocks.label: Answer B
blocks.text: B. “Why did this affect me this way?”

blocks.label: Answer C
blocks.text: C. “It’s okay, everything’s a lesson.”

blocks.label: Answer D
blocks.text: D. “We’ve got this — keep going!”

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: When you get feedback, you...

blocks.label: Answer A
blocks.text: A. Sense the emotions behind the words.

blocks.label: Answer B
blocks.text: B. Examine your internal response first.

blocks.label: Answer C
blocks.text: C. Take it in stride and use it as fuel.

blocks.label: Answer D
blocks.text: D. See it as guidance for the team or future path.

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: Your friends would describe you as...

blocks.label: Answer A
blocks.text: A. Deeply compassionate.

blocks.label: Answer B
blocks.text: B. Mindful and grounded.

blocks.label: Answer C
blocks.text: C. Uplifting and positive.

blocks.label: Answer D
blocks.text: D. Inspiring and unifying.

blocks.label: Description
blocks.text:
Well done —you didn’t just take a quiz... you took a moment to understand you.

What you've just done shows courage, curiosity, and a deeper kind of intelligence that most overlook.

🔎 Press the button below and step into the mirror —where you’ll meet the version of you that’s been waiting to be seen.

blocks.label: Title
blocks.text: 💎 Result A: The Grounded Heart

blocks.label: Description
blocks.text:
You’re the emotional anchor in the room. Calm under pressure, deeply 
empathetic, and quietly powerful — you’re someone others instinctively 
turn to when the world gets messy. You don’t just feel — you understand.
 Your presence says, “We’ve got this,” and your grounded energy inspires
 trust wherever you go.
🌟 Your Superpower: Emotional stability that soothes storms.
💡 Your Growth Edge: Speak your truth boldly — your voice matters more than you think.
🧠 Next Level: Your kind of leadership is rare. Double down by setting boundaries with clarity and care — your inner peace is

blocks.label: Title
blocks.text: 🔥 Result B: The Expressive Flame

blocks.label: Description
blocks.text:
You’re emotionally alive, intuitive, and fiercely expressive. You don’t 
bottle things up —you share from the heart and connect deeply because of
 it. You make the invisible visible. Your emotions are your radar and 
your storytelling is your strength.
🌟 Your Superpower: Authentic connection through raw honesty.
💡 Your Growth Edge: Pause before reacting — your depth deserves direction.
🧠
 Next Level: Channel your intensity into passion projects or people who 
match your fire. You’re here to shake things up, not tone it down.

blocks.label: Title
blocks.text: 🧠 Result C: The Thoughtful Observer

blocks.label: Description
blocks.text:
You’ve got range —you think before you feel, and when you do feel, it’s 
insightful and wise. You’re a thinker with heart, observing everything 
from the shadows and making powerful inner decisions. You’re not cold 
—you’re strategic, and that makes your empathy intentional, not 
reactive.
🌟 Your Superpower: Pattern recognition with emotional depth.
💡 Your Growth Edge: Let your guard down more often —your truth doesn’t need to be perfect to be powerful.
🧠 Next Level: Build trust by expressing more of what you feel in the moment —people are ready for the full you.

blocks.label: Title
blocks.text: ⚡ Result D: The Adaptive Mirror

blocks.label: Description
blocks.text:
You feel others so well, it’s almost second nature. You can walk into a 
room and know exactly what’s going on emotionally. You shift, adapt, and
 move fluidly —not out of fear, but because you get it. This makes you 
magnetic, relatable, and deeply influential.
🌟 Your Superpower: Emotional mirroring —people feel safe around you.
💡 Your Growth Edge: Don’t lose yourself in everyone else’s story.
🧠 Next Level: Anchor your identity in values, not vibes —when you do, your impact goes from flexible to unstoppable.

blocks.label: Title
blocks.text: “You don’t need permission to rise —you only need awareness of your own power.”
